overview: Passenger - Montreux Jazz Festival 7th July 2014.  Life's for the Living  1.Riding To New York  2.The Sound of Silence (Simon & Garfunkel cover)  3.I Hate  4.Patient Love  5.Wake Me Up  6.Let Her Go  7.27  8.House on a Hill  9.Scare Away The Dark  10.Whispers  11.Holes
